title: You and Your Vote
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Jack S. Allan and Loch Townsend
brief_description: In an attempt to overcome informal voting in Senate elections, an account is given of the work of the Electoral Office and the correct way in which a vote should be recorded.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Jack S. Allan and Loch Townsend
